summary: Based on Victor Malarek's best-selling autobiography, this is the true story of a streetwise kid who emerges from a violent and unjust background to become one of journalism's top reporters.
cast: Elias Koteas|Kerrie Keane|Al Waxman|Daniel Pilon|Michael Sarrazin|Kahil Karn|Vittorio Rossi|Claire Rodger|Brian Dooley|Bruce Ramsay|Ross Hull|Alex Brown|Joe Cazalet|Mark Hellman|Patrick Cardarelli|Susan Bain|Nigel Robertson|Susan Almgren|Walter Massey|Gayle Garfinkle|Thérèse Morange|Isabelle Cyr|Michael Burns|Andrew Campbell|Robert Austern|Daniel Nalbach|Jeremy Spry|Steven Bednarski|Mathew Machay|Paul Timm|Raymond Bélisle|Claudia Cardinal|Sam LeMarquand|Andrew Johnston|Thomas Dane|Brian Furlong|Tim Hine|Jersey Long|Frank Fontaine|Susan Glover|Huguette Lafond|Bruce Ramsey|Sam Stone
title: Malarek
